TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Clipboard extends System.Object
public ref class Clipboard abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供利於將資料傳入和傳出系統剪貼簿的靜態方法。

span.span: Provides static methods that facilitate transferring data to and from the system Clipboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有應用程式[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)]共用系統剪貼簿，因此當您切換到另一個應用程式內容可能會變動。All applications for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] share the system Clipboard, so the contents are subject to change when you switch to another application. 取得一份預先定義的格式可搭配類別，請參閱類別。For a list of predefined formats available to use with the class, see the class. **安全性警示：**基於安全性考量，下列各點應該務必記住。**Security Alert:** For security purposes, the following points should be kept in mind. - 貼上作業需要使用者啟動 （Ctrl-V、 貼上 功能表）。Paste operations need to be user initiated (Ctrl-V, Paste Menu). - 複製只能在選取的使用者內容。Copy can only be on user selected content. - 在複製或剪下，部分信任程式碼會讓純文字和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]入剪貼簿。On copy or cut, partial trust code puts plaintext and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] on to the clipboard. 純文字包含文字、 Unicode 文字、 OEM （Exchange 物件模型） 的文字和 CSV （逗點分隔值）。Plaintext includes text, Unicode text, OEM (Object Exchange Model) text, and CSV (Comma-separated values). - 貼上、 在[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]會貼上[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]該內容的來源是否來自同樣受信任或更受信任的網站。On paste, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] will paste in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] if the source of that content is from a equally trusted or more trusted site. 尤其是：Specifically: - 部分信任應用程式可以貼上[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]從完全信任應用程式。A partial trust application can paste [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] from a full trust application. - 部分信任應用程式可以貼上[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]從部分信任應用程式。A partial trust application can paste [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] from a partial trust application. - 完全信任應用程式可以將 XAML 貼只能從另一部完全受信任的應用程式。A full trust application can paste XAML only from another fully trusted application. - 非[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]完全信任應用程式可以檢查剪貼簿上的保留 ApplicationTrust 格式，並視淨化 XAML。A non-[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] full trust application can examine the ApplicationTrust format on the clipboard and sanitize the XAML if appropriate. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何將資料加入至系統剪貼簿。The following example shows how to add data to the system Clipboard. [!code-csharp[DragDrop_DragDropMiscCode#_SetData](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DragDrop_DragDropMiscCode/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_setdata)] [!code-vb[DragDrop_DragDropMiscCode#_SetData](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DragDrop_DragDropMiscCode/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_setdata)]

summary.span: 清除系統剪貼簿上的任何資料。

span.span: Clears any data from the system Clipboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法相當於呼叫**OleSetClipboard**(**null**)。Calling this method is equivalent to calling **OleSetClipboard**(**null**).

summary.span: 查詢 [剪貼簿] 中是否有 資料格式的資料。

span.span: Queries the Clipboard for the presence of data in the data format.

returns.span: 如果剪貼簿包含 資料格式的資料，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the Clipboard contains data in the data format; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回`true`只有指定的資料格式有原生上剪貼簿。 這個方法不會檢查是否存在的自動轉換的資料格式。This method returns `true` only if the specified data format exists natively on the Clipboard; this method does not check for the presence of auto-convertible data formats.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料格式的查詢或會傳回`true`如果資料可以自動轉換成指定的資料格式。A query for the data format or will return `true` if the data can be automatically converted to the specified data format. 針對其他資料格式，這個方法會傳回`true`只有指定的格式是使用原生剪貼簿上。For other data formats, this method returns `true` only if the specified format is available natively on the Clipboard. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用這個方法。The following example demonstrates the use of this method. span.span: if the Clipboard contains data in the data format; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回`true`原本就存在於指定的資料格式，或可從剪貼簿上自動轉換的資料格式時，才這個方法不會檢查是否有自動轉換的資料格式。This method returns `true` only if the specified data format exists natively or is available as an auto-convertible data format on the Clipboard; this method does not check for the presence of auto-convertible data formats. 點陣圖表示電腦圖形為記憶體中的位元陣列，而這些位元代表屬性的映像中的個別像素。A bitmap represents a computer graphic as an array of bits in memory, and these bits represent the attributes of the individual pixels in an image.

summary.span: 查詢剪貼簿中是否存在有效文字資料格式的資料。

span.span: Queries the Clipboard for the presence of data in a valid text data format.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Windows.IDataObject GetDataObject ();
.method public static hidebysig class System.Windows.IDataObject GetDataObject() cil managed
Public Shared Function GetDataObject () As IDataObject
public: static System::Windows::IDataObject ^ GetDataObject();

summary.span: 傳回資料物件，這個物件代表剪貼簿的整個內容。

span.span: Returns a data object that represents the entire contents of the Clipboard.

returns.span: 得以存取系統剪貼簿之整個內容的資料物件，如果剪貼簿上沒有資料，則傳回 。

span.span: A data object that enables access to the entire contents of the system Clipboard, or if there is no data on the Clipboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在系統剪貼簿資料的存取權透過啟用*資料物件*，也就是說，該物件會實作介面。Access to data on the system Clipboard is enabled through a *data object*, that is, an object that implements the interface. 一份預先定義的格式由所定義類別。A list of predefined formats is defined by the class. 使用所指定的方法中的欄位和來檢查及從資料物件擷取資料。Use the methods specified by and fields in to examine and extract the data from the data object. 若要檢查的系統剪貼簿上的資料格式，請呼叫這個方法所傳回的資料物件上。To examine the formats of data on the system Clipboard, call on the data object returned by this method. 若要從系統 剪貼簿中擷取資料，請呼叫，以及指定所需的資料格式。To retrieve data from the system Clipboard, call and specify the desired data format. 剪貼簿共用的所有應用程式的系統，因此資料到剪貼簿上的可能會變更其他應用程式。The system Clipboard is shared by all applications, so data on the Clipboard is subject to change by other applications.

permission.span: 在系統剪貼簿上存取資料的權限。

span.span: for permission to access data on the system Clipboard.
Associated enumeration: **AllClipboard**.

span.span: A collection of strings, where each string specifies the name of a file in the list of dropped files on the Clipboard, or if the data is unavailable in this format.

Public Shared Sub SetDataObject (data As Object)

param.name: data
param.span: 要放在系統剪貼簿上的資料物件 (可實作 的物件)。

span.span: A data object (an object that implements ) to place on the system Clipboard.

summary.span: 將指定的非持續性資料物件放在系統剪貼簿上。

span.span: Places a specified non-persistent data object on the system Clipboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，資料會放在系統剪貼簿上具有應用程式結束時，便會自動清除從剪貼簿。By default, data placed on the system Clipboard with is automatically cleared from the Clipboard when the application exits. > [!NOTE] > 清除剪貼簿應用程式結束時的預設行為可能與其他實作，可能會導致應用程式結束，而非清除它預設剪貼簿的資料不同。The default behavior of clearing the Clipboard on application exit might differ from other implementations, which might leave data on the Clipboard on application exit rather than clearing it by default. 使用多載，並指定`copy`參數做為`true`若不想讓資料從剪貼簿在應用程式結束清除。Use the overload and specify the `copy` parameter as `true` if you do not want data cleared from the Clipboard on application exit. > > 提供的基本實作介面。 provides a basic implementation of the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 點陣圖表示電腦圖形為記憶體中的位元陣列，而這些位元代表屬性的映像中的個別像素。A bitmap represents a computer graphic as an array of bits in memory, and these bits represent the attributes of the individual pixels in an image. 此方法會將資料與啟用的自動轉換。This method adds data with auto-conversion enabled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此資料格式表示 16 位元的字元編碼的 Unicode，也稱為 utf-16，與 ucs-2。This data format denotes 16-bit character encoded Unicode, also referred to as UTF-16, and UCS-2. 這個方法會將資料加入停用自動轉換。This method adds data with auto-conversion disabled.
